lead_paragraph: Olympic athletes from the United States will look ready to sail back home when they attend the closing ceremony at this year's games in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.print_headline: US Olympians Get Nautical Look for Rio's Closing Ceremony
headline.main: US Olympians Get Nautical Look for Rio's Closing Ceremony
